reviews.customers_say: Customers find this dress classy and expensive-looking, with a flattering cut that hugs curves in the right places. The dress is comfortable, well-made, and features a thick sweater material that's super soft. They appreciate its nice color, with one customer specifically mentioning its perfect fall rusty orange shade. items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Flowy dress, thick material, good quality
items.body: I'm 5'2, 137 lbs and I got a size small and it fit well. It is a great dress and actually a lot thicker than I thought it would be, which is awesome so that it's not see through especially for a photoshoot. Love the flowiness and it looks great with or without a belt... Still working on my post-baby body so I decided to go with a belt. Sleeve length was a tiny bit long for be but as you can see in the pic it's not a big deal at all. Read more
items.author: SMO

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars I have NEVER had a more comfortable dress
items.body: I was shopping last minute for a dress to wear to my cousins wedding. I found this and was happy with the reviews- fingers crossed. It arrived (I bought a small and medium) and I immediately fell in love! Both fit great, but I went with the medium just because it fell a little more nicely. I have never felt so beautiful in a dress. It is soft and super stretchy and warm but doesn't make you roast. It's perfect for church, a winter wedding, or just date night. It's my new favorite and I'd like to find an excuse to wear it- and I typically donâ€™t care much for dresses. I wear it with fleece lined leggings and I feel so cozy and comfortable, yet elegant, all day. Iâ€™m 5'9, 140lbs, it hugged me and made me feel like a princess. It comes mid to low shin. It twirls and it's loose yet fitted. It doesn't squeeze at all. Also if I eat way too much and press out my stomach, I found it'll make a wonderful maternity dress some day ha! If youâ€™re wondering whether or not to, the answer is yes. I hope you love it as much as I do! I'd like to buy another in a different color (I have the green, gorgeous for any occasion!) (Wife on her husbands account, my name is not David ðŸ˜†) Read more
items.author: NMR27

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Beautiful dress
items.body: This dress is very nice. Soft, true to size, and flattering. For sz reference Iâ€™m usually a 6 or an 8, 134 lbs and 5â€™ 4â€. I ordered a small. I believe it will be incredibly comfortable. Cozy too. I think Iâ€™m go to order another color! Read more
items.author: Jennifer

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great quality but it's burgundy/ bright wine. Better than color in photo!
items.body: Medium fit perfectly. The color is a gorgeous true burgundy/ deep red, NOT this drab, rusty brownish. I was hoping it would be the color I got lol! It's thicker knit so it looks expensive, not like some "knits" on amazon that are really thin and cheap-looking. Great quality and drape. Wrinkles came out easily by steaming but be patient. Go over the areas several times. Highly recommend! Read more
items.author: A Daisy Thing

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Prettiest winter dress on the internetðŸ’™
items.body: So soft and gorgeous! Material feels weighty and high quality. Good long length, I am 5â€™7 and it is long on me. Most flattering dress I own, very good for postpartum body and easy breastfeeding access!! My husband said itâ€™s the most beautiful dress Iâ€™ve bought in a long time. His new favorite. :) I was a little hesitant to spend 50 dollars on this, but it was worth it. My advice: If youâ€™re on the fence, go for it!! I bought the blue color and it is vibrant just as pictured. Read more
items.author: Sarah Doan

items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars Quality issues, but beautiful dress
items.body: Beautiful dress, soft, thick material. Flattering cut. My issue is with quality- I wore it one time to take photos and it got multiple loose threads and runs in the skirt. Read more
items.author: Alex Cartagena

short_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve V Neck Maxi is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

If you are between sizes, choose based on how close you like the fit through the waist and hips, then adjust with your usual layering choices.

long_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve V Neck Maxi is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: 5, 5.5, 6, 6.5, 7, 7.5, 8, 8.5, 9, 9.5, 10, 11.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Brown, Blue, Light Green, Black, Coffee, Orange, Dark Green, Rose Red, Navy, Wine Red, Khaki, Pink, Beige, Orange Red. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
